data.lyric:
[ti:Gone]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Gone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Gone - Dierks Bentley
[00:05.07]Lyrics by：Ben Johnson/Nicolle Galyon/Niko Moon
[00:10.14]Composed by：Ben Johnson/Nicolle Galyon/Niko Moon
[00:15.21]My buddies think I'm on the lake
[00:18.12]Boss thinks I've been sick for days
[00:21.60]And mama's probably on her way
[00:23.74]'Cause I ain't picked up the phone
[00:26.96]I've been a million places
[00:29.75]But they're all up in my head
[00:33.75]Over-drinking overthinking ever since you left
[00:39.39]I've been gone I've been gone
[00:42.45]I've been sittin' on the couch watching TV all day long
[00:47.27]All day long I've been tryin' to figure out how a good thing went wrong
[00:52.95]Faster than that freight train farther than that airplane
[00:56.06]Sadder than a country song
[00:59.40]Headed down that highway anywhere but my way
[01:02.55]Ever since you moved on I've been gone
[01:12.54]Took a trip down memory lane
[01:15.76]Checked into hotel heartbreak
[01:18.92]Passed rock bottom on the way
[01:21.25]Without leaving my living room
[01:24.63]I've been a million places
[01:27.36]But they're all up in my head
[01:31.28]Over-drinking overthinking ever since you left
[01:36.96]I've been gone I've been gone
[01:40.11]I've been sittin' on the couch watching TV all day long
[01:44.87]All day long I've been tryin' to figure out how a good thing went wrong
[01:50.43]Faster than that freight train farther than that airplane
[01:53.71]Sadder than a country song
[01:57.05]Headed down that highway anywhere but my way
[02:00.15]Ever since you moved on I've been gone
[02:06.28]Yeah I've been gone
[02:15.67]All the clothes are on the floor
[02:17.35]All the mail's by the door
[02:18.89]All the whiskey bottles in my bed
[02:22.27]All the dishes in the sink
[02:23.65]All the gas is in the tank
[02:25.26]All the neighbors probably think I'm dead
[02:28.30]I've been gone I've been gone
[02:31.32]I've been sittin' on the couch watching TV all day long
[02:36.14]All day long I've been tryin' to figure out how a good thing went wrong
[02:41.68]Faster than that freight train farther than that airplane
[02:44.91]Sadder than a country song
[02:48.23]Headed down that highway anywhere but my way
[02:51.33]Ever since you moved on I've been gone
[03:00.25]I've been gone
[03:07.34]Gone
data.trans:
[ti:Gone]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Gone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.07]//
[00:10.14]//
[00:15.21]朋友们以为我已经与世隔绝
[00:18.12]老板觉得我是病了很久
[00:21.60]妈妈或许正在来的路上
[00:23.74]因为我没有接她的电话
[00:26.96]我去过无数个地方
[00:29.75]但它们都只存在于我的幻想
[00:33.75]从你离开过后 我借酒浇愁 想了太多
[00:39.39]我失魂落魄 我失魂落魄
[00:42.45]我整天坐在沙发上看着电视
[00:47.27]一整天 我一直想要弄懂 幸福在哪里出错
[00:52.95]比货运列车更加来去匆匆 比飞机更加遥不可及了
[00:56.06]比乡村音乐更多几分悲伤
[00:59.40]沿着高速公路往下走 哪里都行 只要不走我那条路
[01:02.55]自从你向着未来迈进之后 我就丢失了魂魄
[01:12.54]沿着记忆之路来一趟旅行
[01:15.76]在心碎酒店登记入住
[01:18.92]走过路上最深的低谷
[01:21.25]其实我连客厅都没有离开过
[01:24.63]我去过无数个地方
[01:27.36]但它们都只存在于我的幻想
[01:31.28]从你离开过后 我借酒浇愁 想了太多
[01:36.96]我失魂落魄 我失魂落魄
[01:40.11]我整天坐在沙发上看着电视
[01:44.87]一整天 我一直想要弄懂 幸福在哪里出错
[01:50.43]比货运列车更加来去匆匆 比飞机更加遥不可及了
[01:53.71]比乡村音乐更多几分悲伤
[01:57.05]沿着高速公路往下走 哪里都行 只要不走我那条路
[02:00.15]自从你向着未来迈进之后 我就丢失了魂魄
[02:06.28]我失魂落魄
[02:15.67]衣服扔得遍地都是
[02:17.35]邮件全都堆在门口
[02:18.89]威士忌酒瓶七歪八扭地倒在床上
[02:22.27]盘子挤满了水槽
[02:23.65]汽油都还在油箱
[02:25.26]左邻右里可能都以为我死了
[02:28.30]我失魂落魄 我失魂落魄
[02:31.32]我整天坐在沙发上看着电视
[02:36.14]一整天 我一直想要弄懂 幸福在哪里出错
[02:41.68]比货运列车更加来去匆匆 比飞机更加遥不可及了
[02:44.91]比乡村音乐更多几分悲伤
[02:48.23]沿着高速公路往下走 哪里都行 只要不走我那条路
[02:51.33]自从你向着未来迈进之后 我就丢失了魂魄
[03:00.25]我失魂落魄
[03:07.34]失魂落魄
